customSolutionsDescription: When off-the-shelf products don't meet your requirements, our engineering team can develop tailored solutions to address your specific challenges.

customSolutionsBenefit2: Integration with existing systems and infrastructure
customSolutionsBenefit4: Dedicated engineering support throughout the lifecycle

hero.title: Shenzhen Hengyunchang Vacuum Technology Co., Ltd.
hero.subtitle: Leading the future of RF power & vacuum solutions since 2010.

founded.title: Company Founded
founded.desc: Hengyunchang was established in Shenzhen with the mission to deliver cutting-edge vacuum & RF power supplies.

firstProduct.title: First RF Generator
firstProduct.desc: Launched the HY-10kW series, quickly adopted by domestic panel manufacturers.

international.title: Global Expansion
international.desc: Opened European office and secured OEM partnerships in Korea & Japan.

innovation.title: Innovation Award
innovation.desc: Received the National High-Tech Innovation Award for ultra-stable 13.56 MHz RF sources.

newHq.title: New HQ & R&D Center
newHq.desc: Moved to a 12,000 m² facility in Bao’an District to boost R&D and production capacity.

values.title: Core Values
values.innovationDesc: Continuously pushing the boundaries of RF & vacuum technology.
values.qualityDesc: Zero-defect mindset, ISO 9001 & CE certified processes.
values.integrityDesc: Transparent, honest and responsible in every partnership.
values.customerDesc: Delivering tailor-made solutions that exceed expectations.

valueDescription.0: Driving breakthroughs in 13.56 MHz & 27.12 MHz RF generators.
valueDescription.1: Rigorous testing to ensure 24×7 reliability in fabs.
